item.description: Join us for a 5-6 mile walk at the Audubon Ipswich River Sanctuary on Saturday, April 14 at 11 am. (If carpooling meet at 10:20 at LL Bean Parking lot-Burlington). the sanctuary address is 87 Perkins Row, Topsfield, MA. $4 entrance fee as well as a $1. FEE payable to the organizer. There is also an optional late lunch at about 3 pm at the Starboard Gallery in Newburyport. This sanctuary is the largest Audubon trail in massachusetts. It offers more than 10 miles of trails and is home to several species of wildlife. See you there.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: IPSWICH RIVER WILDLIFE SANCTUARY
